Box 2002
University, Alabama
May 29, 1953
The Beacon Press
25 Beacon Street
Boston 8, Massachusetts
Gentlemen*
Thank you Tor the copy of "The Jeffersonian Heritage*1 and
accept my roost sincere congratulations for an interesting, beautiful, and
unusual book.
I certainly hope the book will receive very good reception and
will be distributed quite widely.
Sincerely yours.
GAspee
cci C* Scott Fletcher
Crayton Ausmus
President
